name: PeopleAsset
description:
PeopleAsset (ExecHunt India Pvt Ltd) is a boutique executive search & talent advisory firm geared to deliver high quality results. We help our Clients dramatically improve performance through focus on leadership & talent. 
 At PeopleAsset, we believe in strengthening businesses through the power of people. Our goal is to help organizations find the right leadership and talent.
features: Work with the highest level of integrity and transparency. Treat our Clients, Candidates, Colleagues and Partners with utmost honesty and fairness.
Follow a first principles based approach and identify non-standard solutions, frameworks and approaches to always deliver best possible outcomes for the clients.
Always seek to give our best with every effort that is put in and be better than our previous effort. Seek to set the bar for our peers to follow.
